body_html: Why do you use CPU for linear algebra in the first place? It should be used for JPEG decoding and data augmentation, and loss function (although some loss functions can be accelerated as well). If you’re doing linear algebra on the CPU you’re doing it wrong. For JPEG and data augmentation Threadripper is sufficient, especially if you replace Pillow with PillowSIMD
